MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the FK3 postcode area of Grangemouth. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10.00am to locate and repair a faulty underground cable outside 1 Bute Place and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12.00 noon. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.55am on the 2nd of March 2021.
